substep.cmd: On the CLC (the primary CLC in an HA setup), configure the CHAP username to be used by the Eucalyptus. The CHAP username can be any value, however it should be unique when sharing a NetApp Filer across multiple Eucalyptus clusters. The SC will not transition to ENABLED state until the CHAP username is configured. For example:
